translation.en: Doc, how pleased are you with Tiger King's depiction of you?
translation.zh:
‎博士 你对《养虎为患》中
‎对你的描绘满意吗？

translation.en: This is not a documentary.
translation.zh: ‎那可不是纪录片

translation.en: Not a documentary.
translation.zh: ‎不是纪录片

translation.en: It's fake. It's a silly fake show.
translation.zh: ‎是假的 那就是一个荒唐的假节目

translation.en: An incredible wild ride of a fanticiful tale.
translation.zh:
‎一段不能尽信的天马行空
‎一个编造出来的故事 ‎NETFLIX 纪录片系列

translation.en: [John Reinke] Doc Antle hated Tiger King.
translation.zh: ‎安特尔博士很讨厌《养虎为患》

translation.en: He thought he was misrepresented in a bunch of lies.
translation.zh: ‎他觉得自己被一堆谎言给歪曲了

translation.en: [Doc] They hid the fact that this facility
translation.zh:
‎他们故意隐瞒了一点 ‎这个设施可以算是
‎大猫住所中的丽思卡尔顿

translation.en: is the Ritz-Carlton of keeping big cats.
translation.zh:
‎这个设施可以算是
‎大猫住所中的丽思卡尔顿 ‎（博伽梵·“博士”·安特尔）

translation.en: No one's even close to the grandeur and beauty of this facility.
translation.zh:
‎我们设施的宏伟和壮丽
‎是其他任何地方都望尘莫及的

translation.en: [Joe Exotic] It's an illusion. He creates an illusion for people to believe.
translation.zh:
‎那就是一个幻象
‎他创造了一个幻象 骗人们相信

translation.en: I haven't spoke to Doc since this came out but he's not happy about it.
translation.zh:
‎自片子播出后 我还没跟博士通过话
‎但他对此很不满意是肯定的

translation.en: [Barbara Fisher] Doc is a very skilled con artist.
translation.zh: ‎博士是个非常非常娴熟的骗子

translation.en: He thinks that he's smarter than the rest of the world
translation.zh: ‎他认为自己比世界上所有人都要聪明

translation.en: and he designs his environment around him to confirm that.
translation.zh:
‎而且他还设计了自己的周遭
‎来确认这一点

translation.en: [Barbara] He creates his own truth always.
translation.zh: ‎他总是创造属于他自己的真相

translation.en: [Barbara] He doesn't live in a world where people challenge him.
translation.zh:
‎他就不活在一个
‎有人会挑战他的世界里

translation.en: He doesn't-- He's not used to that anymore.
translation.zh: ‎他不…他已经不习惯那样了

translation.en: The silly little girl Barbara Fisher, that bitch is on there talking, saying,
translation.zh:
‎但那个蠢女孩芭芭拉·菲舍尔
‎那个贱人在上面满嘴跑火车 说什么

translation.en: "They forced me to get a boob job after a month." Like, are you mad?
translation.zh:
‎“工作一个月后 他们就逼我去隆胸”
‎真是的 你疯了吗？

translation.en: She was obsessed with having boobs.
translation.zh: ‎她整天就想着要怎么丰胸

translation.en: Those boobs didn't live here, she's living out there,
translation.zh:
‎我这儿可关不住那对奶子
‎她在外头风流着呢

translation.en: test driving them on every Tom, Dick, and Harry she can find.
translation.zh:
‎饥不择食地在每个她能找到的
‎汤姆、迪克和哈里身上试用呢

translation.en: -That's why she's pregnant all the time. -Oh, fuck.
translation.zh:
‎-所以她才老是怀孕
‎-噢 我操

translation.en: In terms of what he said about me, it's pure misogyny, that's what it is.
translation.zh:
‎关于他说我的那些话
‎完全是厌女症 就是这么回事

translation.en: [Barbara] Since Tiger King, we had people coming by the house, recognizing the dog.
translation.zh:
‎自从《养虎为患》后
‎有不少人经过我们家门口时 ‎会认出我们的狗来

translation.en: Just the fact that everybody probably could figure out where I lived
translation.zh:
‎所有人想找的话
‎都能找出我住在那里

translation.en: and that means Doc knew where I lived.
translation.zh: ‎这就意味着博士也知道我住在哪里

translation.en: That was scary to me, so we just went out into the deep country
translation.zh:
‎这对我来说很可怕
‎于是我们搬到了乡下中的乡下来

translation.en: and that's where we remain.
translation.zh: ‎我们要一直待在这里了

translation.en: [Barbara] Doc has gotten away with this for so long, he thinks he's bulletproof.
translation.zh:
‎博士在这件事上逍遥法外太久了
‎他以为没人能动得了他

translation.en: But after Tiger King, all these people contacted me with their own stories.
translation.zh:
‎但在《养虎为患》之后
‎有好多人带着自己的故事 联系了我

translation.en: I knew that if I came forward, other people would too.
translation.zh:
‎我知道如果我站出来的话
‎其他人也会站出来

translation.en: [Barbara] There is safety in numbers.
translation.zh: ‎人多确实比较安全

translation.en: [Barbara] Maybe he doesn't think that you'll look back into his past.
translation.zh:
‎或许他就没想过
‎人们会回头去追溯他的过去

translation.en: But what's going on with Doc won't survive in sunlight.
translation.zh:
‎但博士搞的那些事
‎绝对是见不得光的

translation.en: [guide] Good morning! It's nice and warm today, isn't it?
translation.zh:
‎早上好！
‎今天天气真好 暖洋洋的 不是吗？

translation.en: -[crowd] Yeah! -[guide] Just a couple rules on it.
translation.zh: ‎好了 先说几个规则啊 各位

translation.en: No cameras are going to be allowed at all today.
translation.zh: ‎今天我们全程都不许拍摄

translation.en: This is your final warning.
translation.zh: ‎这是给大家最后的警告

translation.en: If we see recording or taking pictures, you will be asked to leave.
translation.zh:
‎要是我们看到你录视频或是拍照片
‎你就会被要求离开

translation.en: I'm Dr. Bhagavan Antle, director here at Myrtle Beach Safari.
translation.zh:
‎我是博伽梵·安特尔博士
‎默特尔比奇野生动物园的理事

translation.en: Myrtle Beach Safari is an incredible wildlife encounter
translation.zh:
‎默特尔比奇野生动物园
‎是一场接触野生动物的绝妙体验

translation.en: where you get to have an up-close, interactive experience
translation.zh: ‎在这里你能够近距离地

translation.en: with a variety of incredible exotic animals
translation.zh: ‎与各种珍禽异兽进行互动

translation.en: up-close, uncaged and unbelievable interaction.
translation.zh:
‎超近距离、无笼阻隔
‎难以想象的互动体验

translation.en: A handful of people in the world get to have an eagle living in your house.
translation.zh:
‎这个世界上
‎能在自己家里养一只鹰的人屈指可数

translation.en: Sitting on the glove watching Game of Thrones.
translation.zh:
‎坐在你手套上一起看
‎《权力的游戏》

translation.en: That doesn't happen a whole lot for a lot of people.
translation.zh:
‎这种事对大多数人来说
‎都是不可能的

translation.en: When I was 12 years old, I got a photo taken in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina.
translation.zh:
‎我12岁时 在南卡罗来纳州的
‎默特尔比奇拍了这么一张照片

translation.en: I looked at my mom and said, "This is what I want to do for the rest of my life."
translation.zh:
‎当时的我看了我妈一眼 然后说：
‎“我这辈子就想干这个了”

translation.en: And when senior year came around, I called up Doc Antle and I said,
translation.zh:
‎到了我高三那年 我打了个电话
‎给安特尔博士和他的公司 我说：

translation.en: "Please let me come volunteer for you,"
translation.zh: ‎“请务必让我来为您做志愿者”

translation.en: and he said, "Well, how soon can you move here?"
translation.zh:
‎然后他说：
‎“那么 你多快能搬到这里来？”

translation.en: And it was like I'd gotten the golden ticket for American Idol.
translation.zh:
‎那种感觉就像是我拿到了
‎去《美国偶像》的金门票一般

translation.en: I'm like, "Ah! Okay."
translation.zh: ‎我说：“啊！好啊”

translation.en: [Jewels] I worked for Doc Antle for seven years.
translation.zh: ‎我为安特尔博士工作了七年

translation.en: My parents were actually really happy that I was doing something
translation.zh:
‎我父母其实还挺高兴的
‎我能够从事一项

translation.en: that I believed I wanted to do.
translation.zh: ‎那时的我相信自己想做的工作

translation.en: I don't think they realized what I was really signing up for,
translation.zh:
‎我想他们没有意识到
‎真正等待着我的是什么

translation.en: which is just 24/7 working at a place that I can't really leave.
translation.zh:
‎那是在一个我无法离开的地方
‎7天24小时不停地工作

translation.en: Barbara was the first person to come and talk to me.
translation.zh: ‎芭芭拉是第一个来找我说话的人

translation.en: Me and Barb focused a lot on training little cubs to become walking adolescents.
translation.zh:
‎我和芭芭拉的主要精力放在了
‎将幼崽训练成会行走的幼狮上

translation.en: We would go to this place called Barefoot Landing every day,
translation.zh:
‎我们每天都会去
‎一个叫贝尔福特兰町的地方

translation.en: and we would do photos with tiger cubs and big cats.
translation.zh: ‎跟老虎幼崽和大猫拍照片

translation.en: [Shavit Perel] One summer, I went to call a friend of mine in Myrtle Beach,
translation.zh:
‎有年夏天我给一个
‎在默特尔比奇的朋友打了通电话

translation.en: and he offered me a job operating a climbing wall in Barefoot Landing.
translation.zh:
‎他提供了我一份在贝尔福特兰町
‎运营攀岩项目的工作

translation.en: [Shavit] As the summer went on, I started developing relationships
translation.zh:
‎随着夏日的进行
‎我开始跟保护站的人

translation.en: with the people that worked at Preservation Station.
translation.zh: ‎关系熟络了起来

translation.en: It started with Barbara, and then it was China.
translation.zh: ‎最开始是芭芭拉 然后是绮娜

translation.en: Everybody looked like Crocodile Dundee.
translation.zh: ‎每个人看起来都像在拍《鳄鱼邓迪》

translation.en: And everybody was tan and blond and had a knife
translation.zh:
‎每个人都晒得黑黝黝的
‎金发然后身上带刀

translation.en: and it was really impressive.
translation.zh: ‎真的挺让人惊叹的

translation.en: And then eventually Doc would show up.
translation.zh: ‎最后呢 博士出现了

translation.en: He just blew me away.
translation.zh: ‎他让我佩服得五体投地

translation.en: By the time we reached the end of summer, he said, "How about you come work for me?"
translation.zh:
‎到了夏天结束的时候 他说：
‎“要不你就来帮我干活吧？”

translation.en: I said, "I'm in."
translation.zh: ‎我说：“好的”

translation.en: I stayed at the barn where the elephant was living.
translation.zh:
‎我住在谷仓里边
‎那边是大象住的地方

translation.en: So I would go to sleep with Bubbles and I would wake up with Bubbles.
translation.zh:
‎所以我会跟泡泡一起睡觉
‎跟泡泡一起起床

translation.en: Who the heck am I to be lucky enough to be in this position?
translation.zh:
‎我到底是何德何能
‎能如此有幸做这份工作？

translation.en: And then they would give me those clothes, and I got my knife.
translation.zh:
‎然后他们会给我那些衣服
‎给我一把刀

translation.en: Now I'm looking like Crocodile Dundee, right?
translation.zh:
‎这下我看起来
‎也像在演《鳄鱼邓迪》了 对吧？

translation.en: I'm the cool guy.
translation.zh: ‎我成了酷哥

translation.en: And it got to the point, like, I'm living a dream.
translation.zh:
‎到后来 我可以算是
‎过上了梦想般的生活

translation.en: But everything completely turned on its head once Julie came into the picture.
translation.zh: ‎但朱莉的出现 将一切都改变了

translation.en: I'm talking to Doc and he goes,
translation.zh: ‎我跟博士讲话的时候 他说：

translation.en: "I just want to let you know, there's a couple of new girls."
translation.zh: ‎“我想知会你一下 来了几个新姑娘”

translation.en: "I don't want you getting involved."
translation.zh: ‎“我不想让你插手”

translation.en: Somebody told me, "Hey, Doc rated you a nine."
translation.zh:
‎有人告诉我：
‎“喂 博士给你打了个九分”

translation.en: Part of me was like, "Oh, yeah," and then part of me is like, "What?"
translation.zh:
‎我心里一边想：“那可好呀”
‎但同时也一边想：“什么？”

translation.en: [Magenta Brooks] Women and men at Doc's compound were treated very differently.
translation.zh:
‎在博士的大本营中
‎女人和男人的待遇很不一样

translation.en: He definitely showed off his giant bed a few more times than was necessary
translation.zh: ‎他确实有过好多次毫无必要地向员工

translation.en: to do with an employee.
translation.zh: ‎炫耀自己巨大的床

translation.en: I had always wondered if I had misread things,
translation.zh:
‎我以前一直会好奇
‎自己是不是过度解读了一些东西

translation.en: and then seeing Tiger King and hearing Barbara talk, it was so cathartic.
translation.zh:
‎但后来在看了《养虎为患》
‎听见芭芭拉说的话后 我恍然大悟

translation.en: It was just this amazing confirmation that I didn't make this up,
translation.zh:
‎这终于帮助我确认了
‎有些东西不是我臆想出来的

translation.en: and other people saw it too. [sighs]
translation.zh: ‎其他人也看到了

translation.en: [Magenta] I am a polyamory relationship coach
translation.zh: ‎我是一名多角婚恋教练

translation.en: and I've been noticing that people keep talking about Doc as being polyamorous.
translation.zh:
‎我注意到很多人在说
‎博士是个多角婚恋者

translation.en: Polyamory requires respect that flows both ways.
translation.zh: ‎多角婚恋需要对彼此的尊重

translation.en: It requires autonomy.
translation.zh: ‎其中要有自主权

translation.en: And Doc is not encouraging his partners
translation.zh: ‎博士完全没有鼓励他的配偶

translation.en: to create healthy relationships outside of him.
translation.zh: ‎与他之外的其他人建立健康的关系

translation.en: -It's a harem, it's not polyamory. -[cryptic music plays]
translation.zh:
‎这是养了一群后宫妻妾
‎不是多角婚恋

translation.en: [Doc] I have my three beloved partners who've been with me for 20 years each.
translation.zh:
‎我有三位心爱的配偶
‎每个人都跟我在一起了20年

translation.en: My son, my three daughters.
translation.zh: ‎我儿子、我的三个女儿

translation.en: And that group of people, along with the peripheral characters around them,
translation.zh: ‎那一群人 还有他们周围的各种角色

translation.en: love doing this and plan on to continue to do it.
translation.zh:
‎都很喜欢做这这份工作
‎也打算继续这么做下去

translation.en: So if I move to the Himalayan Mountains today,
translation.zh:
‎所以 如果我今天
‎突然搬到喜马拉雅山脉中去

translation.en: those guys should be able to step up and run some facsimile of it.
translation.zh:
‎这帮人应该能够挺身而出
‎将这份事业八九不离十地进行下去

translation.en: [Magenta] He's got this very highly overinflated sense of self. He sees himself as kind of a guru.
translation.zh: ‎他自视甚高 认为自己是个大师

translation.en: And so, having followers or having animals that are subservient to him
translation.zh: ‎于是拥有听命于他的追随者和动物

translation.en: kind of bolsters that narrative.
translation.zh: ‎算是进一步加强了这种说法

translation.en: [Barbara] After we all changed our names, he gave a bunch of us different chains.
translation.zh:
‎就在我们都改完名后
‎他给了我们一些不同的链条

translation.en: The medallion signified to all of us
translation.zh: ‎这块垂饰象征着我们所有人

translation.en: this union of us all being one family.
translation.zh: ‎我们这个集体是一个大家庭

translation.en: It's a symbol for the integral yoga that Swami Satchidananda purported.
translation.zh: ‎这是沙吉难陀宣扬的整体瑜珈的标志

translation.en: He was the guru that opened Woodstock.
translation.zh: ‎他就是为伍德斯托克开场的那个大师

translation.en: A picture of the big bearded guy going, "Let's start."
translation.zh:
‎一个大胡子的人说“我们开始吧”
‎那张照片里的人

translation.en: That's Swami Satchidananda.
translation.zh: ‎就是沙吉难陀

translation.en: [Doc] Tons of famous people are longtime devotees.
translation.zh: ‎有好多名人都是他长期的忠实信徒

translation.en: [Barbara] He met Swamiji Satchidananda in Yogaville.
translation.zh: ‎他是在瑜伽村遇见的沙吉难陀

translation.en: [Barbara] All these people devoted to Swamiji and listening to everything he says,
translation.zh:
‎所有这些人都对沙吉顶礼膜拜
‎把他说的每一个字奉为圭臬

translation.en: and basing every aspect of their life around him.
translation.zh: ‎运用到自己生活的方方面面中

translation.en: [Barbara] If there's somebody he idolized, it's Swamiji.
translation.zh:
‎如果要说他崇拜谁的话
‎那就非沙吉莫属了

translation.en: The way he talks about him, it's beyond hero worship.
translation.zh:
‎他谈论沙吉时 说话的方式
‎简直超乎了对英雄的崇拜

translation.en: [man] How did you go from Yogaville to being a--
translation.zh: ‎你是怎么从瑜伽村出来 成为了一个…

translation.en: [Doc] Once you add Yogaville,
translation.zh: ‎一旦你提到了瑜伽村

translation.en: you're dropping in this incredibly complicated,
translation.zh: ‎你就加入了这一个复杂到不可思议

translation.en: cult-ridden, strange entity, like, "What?"
translation.zh:
‎充满邪教意味、奇怪的团体
‎干嘛呢？

translation.en: [female voice] The Reverend Sri Swami Satchidananda
translation.zh: ‎可敬的沙吉难陀导师

translation.en: experienced the spiritual oneness of all creation
translation.zh: ‎在体验了森罗万象在精神上的合一后

translation.en: and dreamed of creating a shrine where that oneness could be seen and felt.
translation.zh:
‎梦想要创造一个
‎能看见和感受到这种万物合一的神庙

translation.en: Swami Satchidananda used to always laughingly say
translation.zh: ‎沙吉难陀以前经常半开玩笑地说：

translation.en: that the yoga institutes were asylums and we were all the inmates.
translation.zh:
‎瑜伽学院都是精神病院
‎而我们全都是病人

translation.en: And people would go, "Ha-ha-ha. That's so funny, Swamiji."
translation.zh:
‎然后大家会说：
‎“这话太搞笑了 沙吉”

translation.en: But it was true. -We were having crisis times. -[tense music plays]
translation.zh:
‎但这是真的
‎当时的我们都处在危机之中

translation.en: People were choosing between yoga and Scientology, and I thought,
translation.zh:
‎那时人们在瑜伽与山达基教之间选择
‎我心想：

translation.en: "I wasn't raised by wolves. I am going to go with yoga."
translation.zh:
‎“我又不是被狼养大的
‎我还是选瑜伽吧”

translation.en: [Satchidananda] Everywhere there seems to be the cry.
translation.zh: ‎似乎到处都有这样的呼喊

translation.en: We hear people shouting in the name of peace,
translation.zh: ‎我们听到有人以和平之名呐喊

translation.en: but they want to fight for peace.
translation.zh: ‎可他们却想以战斗来获取和平

translation.en: Most of the people at Yogaville are loving, caring individuals,
translation.zh:
‎瑜伽村里大多都是充满爱心
‎关怀他人的人

translation.en: who want to better themselves spiritually and want to better the world.
translation.zh:
‎他们想要提高自己在精神上的修行
‎还想要创造一个更好的世界

translation.en: [female voice] Yogaville is an intentional community
translation.zh: ‎瑜伽村是一个理念村

translation.en: where people choose to live together
translation.zh:
‎在那里的人们
‎是自己选择要住在一起

translation.en: practicing yoga, vegetarian diet, meditation.
translation.zh: ‎练习瑜伽、吃斋、冥想

translation.en: There's probably close to 250 permanent residents.
translation.zh: ‎大概有接近250名永久居民

translation.en: My parents met Swami Satchidananda when I was five years old,
translation.zh:
‎我的父母遇见沙吉难陀时
‎我还只有5岁

translation.en: and I started meditating myself when I was 11, by choice.
translation.zh:
‎等到我11岁时
‎我自己也选择开始了冥想

translation.en: I was doing, I don't know, four to six hours a day of yoga and meditation, yeah.
translation.zh:
‎那时我每天要做
‎四到六小时的瑜伽和冥想 嗯

translation.en: We were a very peaceful, loving, accepting…
translation.zh:
‎我们是一个
‎非常平和、有爱、包容的社群

translation.en: Hari om, hari om, hari om.
translation.zh: ‎哈里唵

translation.en: [female voice] People believe Swami Satchidananda is a god.
translation.zh: ‎人们相信沙吉难陀就是一个神

translation.en: -A Jesus Christ. He can do no wrong. -[gentle music plays]
translation.zh: ‎跟耶稣基督一样 他不会做坏事

translation.en: They would drop to the ground when he walked into the room and bow to his feet.
translation.zh:
‎当他走进房间时
‎他们会立刻五体投地地敬拜

translation.en: Kiss his feet.
translation.zh: ‎去亲他的脚

translation.en: [Sachi] I watched Tiger King, and I was like, "Damn."
translation.zh:
‎我看了《养虎为患》后 心想： ‎“唉 他们是不知道
‎这一切之前的故事啊”

translation.en: "They don't even know the story before that."
translation.zh:
‎“唉 他们是不知道
‎这一切之前的故事啊”

translation.en: Doc Antle got ideas from Swami Satchidananda.
translation.zh: ‎安特尔博士受到了沙吉难陀的启发

translation.en: He was attracted to the power that he wielded over other people.
translation.zh:
‎他对这份凌驾于他人之上的权力
‎充满了渴望

translation.en: Bhagavan was a very well-known character at Yogaville.
translation.zh: ‎博伽梵在瑜伽村 可是个风云人物

translation.en: Swami Satchidananda loved him. He was, you know, lots of flash.
translation.zh:
‎沙吉难陀很喜欢他 他那时候
‎你知道的 很招摇很拉风

translation.en: He had Bubbles, the little baby elephant.
translation.zh: ‎他养了泡泡 一只幼象

translation.en: He was like a celebrity there.
translation.zh: ‎他在那里 可以算是个明星吧

translation.en: [female announcer] Bhagavan Antle of Bhagavan's Celestial Magic.
translation.zh:
‎来自博伽梵天神法术的
‎博伽梵·安特尔

translation.en: [Joan] He was the cute boy of the '80s. He had long dark hair, a mustache.
translation.zh:
‎他就是那种80年代的帅男孩
‎一头深色长发 留着胡须

translation.en: He was a magic man.
translation.zh: ‎他是个魔术师

translation.en: [Steven Diamond] The two of us had an instant connection through magic.
translation.zh:
‎我们俩通过魔术
‎立刻就建立起了联系来

translation.en: I was about 15 or 16.
translation.zh: ‎当时我大概十五六岁

translation.en: I had my own career at that time, so I was doing fairs and festivals.
translation.zh:
‎已经有了自己的事业
‎我会在集市和庆典上表演

translation.en: And I was very popular all up and down the East Coast.
translation.zh: ‎那时我在东海岸上下都很受欢迎

translation.en: Bhagavan saw me as a great way to make some money.
translation.zh: ‎博伽梵把我视为一个赚钱的好方法

translation.en: [Steven] And so, right away we kind of formed this little informal partnership.
translation.zh:
‎于是 我们立刻形成了这么一种
‎非正式的合作关系

translation.en: A 50/50 plan was the deal.
translation.zh: ‎我们说好了要五五分账

translation.en: [Steven] Come down, guys! Run!
translation.zh: ‎快来呀 伙伴们！快跑！

translation.en: [Steven] He had this place called The Buckingham Zoological Park.
translation.zh:
‎他拥有这么一个
‎叫“白金汉动物园”的地方

translation.en: Right outside of Yogaville.
translation.zh: ‎就在瑜伽村之外

translation.en: You'd drive down this little country road and you wouldn't know that it was there
translation.zh:
‎要是你开在那条乡间小路上
‎都不会发现它的存在

translation.en: unless you knew exactly how to find it.
translation.zh: ‎除非你本来就知道该怎么找过去

translation.en: You walked through the little gate and you see this A-frame house.
translation.zh:
‎先走过一扇小门
‎然后你会看到一栋尖顶的房子

translation.en: It kind of looked like something a hobbit might live in.
translation.zh: ‎看上去有点像是霍比特人会住的地方

translation.en: And immediately, as soon as you walked in, you could see an elephant in the distance,
translation.zh:
‎然后呢 你一走进去就能看到
‎远处有一头大象

translation.en: and you could see tigers back there, you could see lions.
translation.zh: ‎你还能看到后头住着老虎啊 狮子啊

translation.en: Good boy.
translation.zh: ‎乖孩子

translation.en: [Steven] In the beginning, it was such a great place.
translation.zh:
‎最开始的时候
‎那里是一个非常棒的地方

translation.en: What I liked about the Buckingham Zoo was the community that Bhagavan had built.
translation.zh:
‎白金汉动物园有一点我很喜欢
‎就是博伽梵建立的那个社群

translation.en: [man] I met Bhagavan right out of high school.
translation.zh: ‎我刚高中毕业就认识了博伽梵

translation.en: He would do local shows around here for schools.
translation.zh: ‎他会在这一带的学校里表演

translation.en: And then I worked with him at the Renaissance Festival.
translation.zh: ‎后来我跟他在文艺复兴节上也合作过

translation.en: [David] I made my living as a juggler for like 25 or 30 years.
translation.zh: ‎我做杂耍讨生活已经25到30年了

translation.en: [David] I'm sort of an entrepreneur.
translation.zh: ‎我可以说是个创业者

translation.en: I had a video business
translation.zh: ‎我以前做过录像生意

translation.en: and I used to videotape his magic show that he would perform.
translation.zh: ‎我会把他表演的魔术节目录成录影带

translation.en: By the constant practice of the control of the life force,
translation.zh: ‎通过不断练习对生命力的控制

translation.en: you will not only be able to control the life force of your mind and body,
translation.zh:
‎你不仅将有能力控制
‎自己心灵与身体的生命力

translation.en: you will also be able to control the life force of the universe, as well.
translation.zh: ‎你还将有能力控制整个宇宙的生命力

translation.en: [David] Bhagavan supposedly had psychic powers
translation.zh: ‎据传博伽梵是有灵力的

translation.en: because he had practiced yoga and his pranayama and acquired
translation.zh: ‎因为他练习了瑜伽和呼吸控制 ‎所以才获得了这些超能力

translation.en: these superpowers.
translation.zh: ‎所以才获得了这些超能力

translation.en: He would walk on coals and he would supposedly levitate things and whatnot.
translation.zh:
‎他能在热煤上走路
‎据传还能让东西浮空什么的

translation.en: Your body can become so fit
translation.zh: ‎你的身体足够强健的话

translation.en: that you are immune to the outside world coming in and influencing you.
translation.zh:
‎你就能对外界
‎一切会影响你的东西免疫

translation.en: [Steven] He would create this illusion that if you listened to him and you followed his ways,
translation.zh:
‎他会给你制造出一种幻觉
‎要是你听从他 追随他的修行之道

translation.en: you would be able to do some of the same things.
translation.zh: ‎你也能获得一部分他的能力

translation.en: [David] These people getting paid almost nothing in promise of getting
translation.zh: ‎于是这些人就免费帮博伽梵干活 ‎为的只是从他那里获取这些超能力

translation.en: these super powers from Bhagavan, when he didn't really have them himself.
translation.zh: ‎为的只是从他那里获取这些超能力 ‎这些实际上连他自己都没有的超能力

translation.en: He was not a great magician.
translation.zh: ‎他并不是一个很棒的魔术师

translation.en: [Doc] This is the Two of Hearts.
translation.zh: ‎这是红心二

translation.en: [David] Ninety-eight percent accuracy.
translation.zh: ‎98%的准确率

translation.en: It was horrible. [laughs] I mean, it just-- It was horrible.
translation.zh: ‎糟糕 他的表演真的… 很糟糕

translation.en: But people liked it because he was the cool guy with the tigers.
translation.zh:
‎但大家还是很喜欢
‎因为他是个养老虎的酷哥

translation.en: These things are nothing in comparison to the accomplishments…
translation.zh:
‎这些事根本不值一提
‎要是拿来对比完成…

translation.en: of the thoughts-- of the control of the thoughts and emotions of the mind.
translation.zh: ‎对人的心灵 对思想和情绪的控制

translation.en: They are but a drop in the ocean by comparison.
translation.zh: ‎相较之下 那就是大海里的一滴水

translation.en: The guru gave Bhagavan all of his teachings, the yoga teachings.
translation.zh:
‎大师把自己的所有教导
‎都传授给了博伽梵 瑜伽的整套教导

translation.en: This philosophy and psychology of how to approach the world.
translation.zh:
‎这是一种如何理解这个世界的
‎哲学与心理学

translation.en: [Joy] I still love the yoga teachings,
translation.zh: ‎我依旧爱着瑜伽的教导

translation.en: but the experience in retrospect
translation.zh: ‎但回过头看这段经历

translation.en: taught me so much about how
translation.zh: ‎很好地教会了我怎样去

translation.en: to be aware of a cult-type approach,
translation.zh: ‎察觉到类邪教的行事方式

translation.en: of wanting to attract people for the purpose of power or greed,
translation.zh:
‎察觉到以谋权或贪婪为目的
‎想要吸引别人的行为

translation.en: and giving…
translation.zh: ‎然后让人产生那种…

translation.en: the feeling that you're going to receive something that isn't possible to get.
translation.zh:
‎你将会得到某种
‎不可能得到之物的那种感觉

translation.en: [Joy] He had complete control.
translation.zh: ‎所有一切都在他的掌控之中

translation.en: We had to wear a certain type of clothing, we had to eat a certain type of food.
translation.zh:
‎我们必须穿某种特定的服饰
‎我们必须吃某种特定的食物

translation.en: I mean, you give everything.
translation.zh: ‎要知道 你献出了一切

translation.en: You give not just your material possessions, but your whole belief system.
translation.zh:
‎你献出的不仅仅是你的物质财富
‎还有你的整个信仰体系

translation.en: One day, you'll be surprised how obedient your mind is.
translation.zh:
‎有一天
‎你们会惊讶自己的心灵有多顺从

translation.en: One will have a body of all health and vitality, free from disease.
translation.zh:
‎你就能拥有一个
‎充满健康与生命力的身体 ‎免受疾病的侵扰

translation.en: It will make the mind calm, clear, and dynamic.
translation.zh: ‎让心灵平静、清晰、有活力

translation.en: [Joy] Bhagavan learned how to use the teachings in a manipulative way.
translation.zh:
‎博伽梵学会了如何利用这些教导
‎来操控别人

translation.en: [Steven] To be part of the zoo,
translation.zh: ‎要成为动物园里的一员

translation.en: you give up your entire life, you give up your name,
translation.zh:
‎你要放弃你全部的生活
‎你要放弃你的姓名

translation.en: you give up your world, you give up your family, your friends.
translation.zh:
‎你要放弃你的世界
‎你要放弃你的家人、你的朋友

translation.en: The tigers become the first priority to the exclusion of everything else.
translation.zh:
‎这些老虎成了头等大事
‎其余的一切都得放在一旁

translation.en: And he's always been that way, and it's just a way of getting free labor.
translation.zh:
‎他一直以来都是这样的
‎这其实不过是他获得免费劳工的办法

translation.en: [guide] Being in the presence of a big cat can be a life-transforming event.
translation.zh:
‎单单是有机会亲身站在大猫身旁
‎就能算是改变人生的重大事件

translation.en: When Doc started building his facility,
translation.zh: ‎博士刚开始建造他的设施时

translation.en: he wanted to embody, like, a Yogaville type of environment,
translation.zh:
‎他就想要营造出
‎一种类似瑜伽村的环境

translation.en: where he's, kind of, the leader of the group
translation.zh: ‎在那里 他算是集体的首领

translation.en: and everyone's working for a greater cause, working with animals,
translation.zh:
‎所有人都在为一个更崇高的理想奋斗
‎与动物一起工作

translation.en: and also incorporating yoga.
translation.zh: ‎同时也融入了瑜伽

translation.en: [male interviewer] Do you practice yoga?
translation.zh: ‎你练瑜伽吗？

translation.en: Cult, cult, cult alarm, um… [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎邪教！邪教！邪教警报！嗯…

translation.en: Myself, I have practiced yoga throughout my life, I've practiced…
translation.zh:
‎我自己呢 我是一直在练瑜伽的
‎我还练过…

translation.en: Myself, I've practiced martial arts from the time I was very young.
translation.zh:
‎我自己啊 我从很小的时候起
‎就开始练武术了

translation.en: I've practiced throughout my life.
translation.zh: ‎我练了一辈子了

translation.en: I always tell my staff that they should go and practice yoga
translation.zh:
‎我总是跟自己的员工说
‎他们应该去练瑜伽

translation.en: so they get a steadiness of mind and body.
translation.zh: ‎这样他们就能练就一个稳定的身心

translation.en: [Shavit] It makes so much sense to use those characteristics of the guru
translation.zh:
‎这样做其实很有道理
‎通过利用大师的那些特质

translation.en: to basically create a culture where you're like God.
translation.zh:
‎创造出这么一种文化来
‎在这里 你就像是神一样

translation.en: [Doc] They come as teenagers and decades later they're still here,
translation.zh:
‎他们青少年时期就到这里来
‎而数十年后 他们依旧在这里

translation.en: because there is a fulfillment from spending time with wildlife.
translation.zh:
‎因为与野生动物在一起
‎是有一种成就感的

translation.en: There's a song,
translation.zh: ‎有一首歌这么唱：

translation.en: "I'm on a vacation because I love my occupation."
translation.zh: ‎“我这是在度假 因为我爱我的工作”

translation.en: "If you don't love what you're doing, change your station."
translation.zh:
‎“如果手上的事你不爱做
‎那就换个行当过活”

translation.en: It's perfect. It's a perfect song.
translation.zh: ‎太到位了 这是一首完美的歌

translation.en: Bhagavan definitely had the desire to create his own following,
translation.zh:
‎博伽梵绝对是有这种欲望的 ‎要创造这么一帮自己的追随者
‎结果他做到了 而且他对此还很擅长

translation.en: and he did and he was very good at it.
translation.zh:
‎要创造这么一帮自己的追随者
‎结果他做到了 而且他对此还很擅长

translation.en: [Steven] I met Joe a couple times at his zoo.
translation.zh: ‎我在乔的动物园里见过几次乔 然后…

translation.en: and I was shocked at what I was seeing,
translation.zh:
‎我在乔的动物园里见过几次乔 然后… ‎我对自己眼前所看到的
‎感到十分震惊

translation.en: because in every way it was a poor man's version,
translation.zh: ‎因为那完完全全就是一个山寨版

translation.en: it was a copy of what Bhagavan had built.
translation.zh: ‎完全就是博伽梵所建之物的复制品

translation.en: This is what we are going to create.
translation.zh: ‎这 便是我们要创造的东西

translation.en: Press play.
translation.zh: ‎按播放键

translation.en: [Joe] I want you to look at the landscaping here.
translation.zh:
‎我想让你们好好看看这里的景观
‎还有其他的一切

translation.en: One man does this entire park because he takes pride in it.
translation.zh: ‎整个园区 全都出自一个人之手 ‎因为这是他引以为傲的事

translation.en: The staff take pride in what they do.
translation.zh: ‎这里的员工 都为自己的工作而骄傲

translation.en: Joe tried to make his park look exactly like Doc Antle's.
translation.zh:
‎乔努力想让他的公园
‎看上去跟安特尔博士的一模一样

translation.en: Everything was about Doc Antle.
translation.zh: ‎一切都是照着安特尔博士来的

translation.en: We will buy safari-looking clothes
translation.zh: ‎我们要买些丛林风的衣服来

translation.en: so you feel like you work in a jungle atmosphere.
translation.zh:
‎这样你才有种自己在
‎丛林氛围里工作的感觉

translation.en: It's very simple, you get up in the morning, you get dressed,
translation.zh: ‎事情很简单 你早上起床 穿好衣装

translation.en: you come to work with a shiny, sparkly attitude.
translation.zh: ‎带着一个金光闪亮的态度来工作

translation.en: [Joe] Until you can get some self-discipline,
translation.zh: ‎在你们能学会一些自律之前

translation.en: we can never do this.
translation.zh: ‎我们是永远也做不到的

translation.en: I have my own following and people. It's called the Temple of the Beast.
translation.zh:
‎我拥有自己的信徒和百姓
‎我们的名字叫“野兽神庙”

translation.en: [Joe] We're a nondenominational church here at the G.W. Zoo, and I'm Pastor Joe.
translation.zh:
‎我们是一个无宗派的教会 ‎就在格韦动物园这里活动
‎而我 便是乔牧师

translation.en: And if you would like to get married with tigers,
translation.zh: ‎要是你想办一场有老虎出席的婚礼

translation.en: we can decorate and do it all
translation.zh: ‎我们会负责装饰 包办一切…

translation.en: just for you.
translation.zh: ‎一切只为你

translation.en: We are here today in the sanctuary of the Church of the Beast
translation.zh:
‎我们今天齐聚一堂
‎在这野兽教会的庇护所里

translation.en: where the sky is our ceiling and the grass is our floor.
translation.zh:
‎天空是我们的天花板
‎绿草是我们的地板

translation.en: [Jewels] People like Joe Exotic and Doc Antle love dressing in costumes.
translation.zh:
‎像乔野生和安特尔博士这样的人
‎很喜欢穿上戏服盛装打扮

translation.en: That's their thing, that's what they love to do is boast,
translation.zh:
‎这是他们的最爱
‎他们最爱做这种吹嘘的事了

translation.en: "I'm Tiger King with all these, you know, beautiful women around me
translation.zh:
‎“我是虎王 我有这么多的… ‎你知道的 大胸美女围绕在我身边
‎还个个穿着皮衣”

translation.en: that all have big boobs and all dressed in leather."
translation.zh:
‎你知道的 大胸美女围绕在我身边
‎还个个穿着皮衣”

translation.en: I can't believe I was actually okay with wearing those costumes.
translation.zh:
‎真不敢相信
‎我那时竟然会同意穿这种戏服

translation.en: I think the one thing that I said absolutely not is not putting on tights.
translation.zh:
‎我想我唯一断然拒绝掉的
‎就是我坚决不穿紧身衣

translation.en: [Barbara] I've been deep into Bhagavan's closet before,
translation.zh: ‎我曾深入过博伽梵的衣橱

translation.en: and you can find the most insane pieces of clothing.
translation.zh: ‎在那里 你能找到最疯狂的衣物

translation.en: This is the Renaissance Fair outfit. I was proud of my chain mail halter top.
translation.zh:
‎这是文艺复兴节的服饰
‎我当时可为我这件锁子甲肚兜骄傲了

translation.en: [male voice] King Richard's Faire! Weekends, September 4 through October 24.
translation.zh:
‎理查德国王节 周末上演
‎9月4日至10月24日 ‎（理查德国王节）

translation.en: [Steven] Renaissance Fairs are this gathering of thousands of people that come
translation.zh: ‎文艺复兴节是一场数千人的大型集会

translation.en: and all the performers and everybody that works at the fair,
translation.zh:
‎到场参加的人
‎所有表演者和在集会工作的人

translation.en: they're all dressed up in these medieval type costumes.
translation.zh: ‎全都会穿上中世纪的服饰

translation.en: And there's usually a swordsmith there, and there will be jugglers,
translation.zh:
‎那里通常会有一个铸剑师
‎还会有杂耍艺人

translation.en: and there will be any type of performer that might have lived back in medieval times.
translation.zh:
‎任何在中世纪生活过的表演者
‎都可能会出现在那里

translation.en: Whenever we went to Renaissance Fairs, Bhagavan was kind of on the prowl,
translation.zh:
‎每次我们去文艺复兴节
‎博伽梵总是如饥似渴地

translation.en: searching for girls.
translation.zh: ‎四处寻找女孩

translation.en: There's no greater pick-up line in the world than,
translation.zh:
‎论搭讪的效果
‎世界上恐怕没有比这句更强的了：

translation.en: "Do you want to pet my tiger?"
translation.zh: ‎“你想不想摸摸我的老虎？”

translation.en: [Magenta] That's how I met him.
translation.zh: ‎我就是这么认识他的

translation.en: I was traveling from state to state doing Renaissance Fairs
translation.zh:
‎我当时正在各州之间跑
‎参加文艺复兴节

translation.en: and I was walking my ferret through the forest area
translation.zh: ‎那天我在森林里遛自己的雪貂

translation.en: and ran smack into a guy walking a lion.
translation.zh: ‎正面撞上了一个在遛狮子的家伙

translation.en: Right now, he is gaining almost a pound every single day.
translation.zh: ‎现在 他每一天都会增重将近一磅

translation.en: I said, "Do you ever hire people?"
translation.zh: ‎我说：“你们招不招人的啊？”

translation.en: And a week later I was hauling elephant poop. I had moved in.
translation.zh:

translation.en: She had been taken out for her birthday, and she comes back to me the next day,
translation.zh:
‎她因为过生日出去了一天
‎第二天回来时 她过来找到了我

translation.en: and she says, "You don't know what's happening to you."
translation.zh: ‎她说：“你不明白他们在对你做什么”

translation.en: "You're being brainwashed."
translation.zh: ‎“你这是在被洗脑”

translation.en: "This is what cults do when they're taking over people's psyches."
translation.zh:
‎“邪教都是这么干的
‎他们会控制人的心灵”

translation.en: And she says, "You've been doing this for so long,
translation.zh: ‎她说：“你已经在这边做了太久

translation.en: you don't even know how off your brain is right now."
translation.zh:
‎你都不知道
‎自己的大脑现在有多不正常”

translation.en: [Magenta] So, she says, "You have to eat."
translation.zh: ‎于是她说：“你必须得吃东西”

translation.en: And she ended up chasing me around the parking lot with a Fig Newton bar,
translation.zh:
‎她拿着一根无花果馅饼条
‎在停车场里追着我

translation.en: screaming, "It's fat-free, for fuck's sake!"
translation.zh: ‎吼着：“这是零脂肪的呀 拜托！”

translation.en: And I refused to eat it because a Fig Newton bar was just too much,
translation.zh:
‎我怎么也不肯吃
‎因为无花果馅饼条实在太过了

translation.en: but I started eating carrots
translation.zh: ‎但我开始吃起了胡萝卜来

translation.en: and I started thinking straight.
translation.zh: ‎我开始能清晰地思考了

translation.en: My brain started working a little better, and I went to Doc
translation.zh:
‎我的大脑开始运作得正常一些了
‎接着 我去找博士

translation.en: and I was like, "I want to stay for the next year."
translation.zh: ‎我跟他说：“我明年想要留下来”

translation.en: I was going to finish up my two-year thing.
translation.zh: ‎我本打算完成这两年的

translation.en: But I decided I didn't want the boob job.
translation.zh: ‎但我决定我不想去做丰胸

translation.en: I decided that wasn't who I wanted to be.
translation.zh: ‎我拿定了主意 那不是我想成为的人

translation.en: And he said, "If you're gonna look like a fat ass, you don't need the tits."
translation.zh:
‎他说：“要是你看起来像个死胖子
‎你不需要奶子也无所谓”

translation.en: I mean, I was still skeletal, I was still concave,
translation.zh:
‎要知道 我当时依旧是皮包骨
‎我还是凹着的

translation.en: and I thought, "Oh, I'm never going to win this game."
translation.zh:
‎于是我想：
‎“噢 这场游戏我永远也赢不了”

translation.en: "And I'm starting to believe him."
translation.zh: ‎“我反而开始相信起他来了”

translation.en: [Magenta] I felt like if I stayed, I was going to be subsumed.
translation.zh:
‎我感觉如果我留下来
‎我最后会被纳入其中的

translation.en: [Doc] In the '80s when we started out,
translation.zh: ‎80年代 我们刚开始的时候

translation.en: Swami Satchidananda had a new idea that was really fresh,
translation.zh:
‎沙吉难陀产生了一个新观念
‎在当时是很新鲜的

translation.en: that what you act like, what you think, what you eat, shapes your health.
translation.zh:
‎你的行为 你的思想 你吃的东西
‎决定了你的身体健康

translation.en: You are what you eat. Please remember that.
translation.zh: ‎人如其食 记住这一点

translation.en: Most of our physical problems are caused by our food that we eat.
translation.zh:
‎我们大部分身体上的毛病
‎都是由于我们所吃的食物造成的

translation.en: Swami led you to believe that he was…
translation.zh: ‎沙吉难陀会让你相信…

translation.en: now an enlightened being and a perfect instrument of God.
translation.zh:
‎他现在是一个大彻大悟的存在
‎是神的一个完美载体

translation.en: [Joy] Bhagavan saw the guru as someone that could get away with everything.
translation.zh:
‎博伽梵把大师看作了一个
‎能够为所欲为而不用负责的人

translation.en: I was very close to the person who took care of Swami Satchidananda
translation.zh: ‎我跟照顾沙吉难陀的人很熟悉

translation.en: and she would confide in me, she would tell me that he would hit her.
translation.zh: ‎她向我吐露过 他有时候会打她

translation.en: If you want to punish somebody who hurts you…
translation.zh: ‎如果你想要惩罚某个 ‎伤害了你的人

translation.en: do something beautiful to that person.
translation.zh: ‎就对那个人做一件非常美好的事

translation.en: She accepted it so easily and lovingly.
translation.zh: ‎她轻描淡写、充满爱意地接受了

translation.en: It was totally crazy, but now I think of it that way,
translation.zh:
‎这真是太疯狂了
‎我现在才是这么想的

translation.en: but at the time, I just put on my rosy-colored glasses, I guess.
translation.zh: ‎可在当时 ‎我却…可能我的看法过于乐观了

translation.en: Stop. Oh no! Flippity-floppity. You big old guy.
translation.zh:
‎-停
‎-糟糕 爱跳鬼 ‎你这个大家伙

translation.en: [Steven] Bhagavan didn't like it when someone, in any kind of way, challenged him
translation.zh:
‎博伽梵很不喜欢别人挑战他
‎哪怕一点点也不行

translation.en: and that was a problem between me and him.
translation.zh: ‎我跟他的矛盾就是在这点上

translation.en: If I did it in front of a group of people, there would be hell to pay.
translation.zh:
‎要是我当着一大群人挑战他的话
‎后面肯定要吃不了兜着走

translation.en: You got to not love me.
translation.zh: ‎最好别跟着我

translation.en: [Steven] And I learned very quickly not to go there.
translation.zh: ‎我很快就学会 不要做这种事

translation.en: -We're trying to not let you film. -[cameraman] Sorry. Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-我们是在想办法不让你拍
‎-对不起 好吧

translation.en: If you come here going, "That's not fair. You didn't listen. I know the way,"
translation.zh:
‎如果你跑到这里来说：“这样不公平
‎你没有听 我懂该怎么做”

translation.en: we have no tolerance or time for anyone like that.
translation.zh:
‎我们不浪费时间
‎对这种人是零容忍的

translation.en: [Barbara] He had a bad temper for sure.
translation.zh: ‎他脾气很不好 这点毫无疑问

translation.en: You do not want to have something you're attached to in front of Bhagavan
translation.zh:
‎你绝不会想把一样你很有感情的东西
‎放在博伽梵面前

translation.en: because he will torture you with that.
translation.zh: ‎因为他会利用那个来折磨你

translation.en: -[eerie music plays] -I loved this one capuchin monkey.
translation.zh: ‎有这么只卷尾猴 我非常喜爱

translation.en: From the time that I saw her, I just was obsessed with her.
translation.zh:
‎从我见到她的第一眼起
‎我就迷恋上了她

translation.en: Bhagavan knew I loved her. He liked that I was taking good care of her.
translation.zh:
‎博伽梵知道我很爱她
‎他很喜欢我把她照顾得很好

translation.en: But he did also like to torture me with the fact that I was so attached.
translation.zh:
‎但他也利用了
‎我对这只猴子很有感情这事来折磨我

translation.en: In one instance in particular, he took her and put her in a freezer.
translation.zh:
‎有那么一回 他抢走了她
‎把她放进了冷冻柜里

translation.en: I mean, she's a little tiny baby
translation.zh: ‎要知道 她那时就只有这么小

translation.en: and he took her and put her in the freezer and closed it
translation.zh:
‎他抢走了她 把她放进了冷冻柜里
‎然后关上了门

translation.en: and just stared at me, waiting for me to stop being upset… [chuckles] …about that
translation.zh:
‎然后就这样盯着我
‎要等到我不为这件事生气为止

translation.en: That's what he was telling me. "I'm teaching you not to be so attached."
translation.zh:
‎他是这么跟我说的：
‎“我在教你不要投入太多的感情”

translation.en: "I need you to just think about how you're feeling
translation.zh:
‎“我需要你好好想一下 ‎你对于
‎这只猴子被关在冷冻柜里的感受

translation.en: with the monkey in the freezer and calm yourself down."
translation.zh:
‎你对于
‎这只猴子被关在冷冻柜里的感受 ‎然后让自己冷静下来”

translation.en: [Sachi] He was capable of doing harm more than your average person.
translation.zh: ‎相较普通人 他更有能力伤害别人

translation.en: He could go from very charming to very angry.
translation.zh:
‎他一瞬间就能从和蔼可亲
‎变成出离愤怒

translation.en: [interviewer] Did you ever see him lose his temper in a way that was scary?
translation.zh:
‎你有没有见过
‎他发那种令人害怕的脾气？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: ‎有

translation.en: With me, one time.
translation.zh: ‎对我 有一次

translation.en: [sighs] Can we stop for a second?
translation.zh: ‎我们能稍稍停一下吗？

translation.en: Yeah. I just need a drink and…
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我需要喝点东西…

translation.en: There were four times in four years where I thought he was going to kill me.
translation.zh:
‎在那四年中 一共有四回
‎我以为他要把我杀掉了

translation.en: He was so incredibly violent to me that I thought, "That's it."
translation.zh: ‎他对我非常之暴力  我心想：“完了”

translation.en: "He got me. This is going to be the time."
translation.zh: ‎“他要杀掉我了 就是这一次了”

translation.en: The first couple times was, I was going to leave him,
translation.zh: ‎头几次的情况是 我打算离开他了

translation.en: it was soon in the relationship.
translation.zh: ‎那是在交往之后不久

translation.en: I wanted to leave. I didn't want to be in the relationship anymore.
translation.zh:
‎我就是想离开了
‎我不想再跟他有这种关系了

translation.en: [voice breaks] And he would beat me or be violent with me.
translation.zh: ‎他会打我 或是对我很暴力

translation.en: And it scared me into staying with him.
translation.zh: ‎这让我很害怕 只有继续跟他在一起

translation.en: Choked me to the point where I passed out,
translation.zh: ‎掐我脖子掐到我晕死过去

translation.en: and one time, he even bragged to his girlfriends
translation.zh: ‎有一次 他甚至还向他的女友们炫耀

translation.en: that he broke two of my ribs to shut me up.
translation.zh:
‎他为了让我闭上嘴
‎打断了我两根肋骨

translation.en: And it's true, he did.
translation.zh: ‎没错 他确实是这么做的

translation.en: [Betsy] He didn't like to hit because it'd leave a scar,
translation.zh: ‎他不喜欢打人 因为会留下伤疤

translation.en: so he used to strangle me because it didn't leave a mark.
translation.zh:
‎所以他以前会掐我脖子
‎因为那样不会留印记

translation.en: He got so mad at me when I got pregnant. He said it was my fault.
translation.zh:
‎我怀孕的时候 他气坏了
‎他说那是我的错

translation.en: When I started giving birth,
translation.zh: ‎我要生孩子的当天

translation.en: somebody tracked him down, and of course he was with his girlfriend at the time,
translation.zh:
‎有人去找了他人在哪里 果不其然
‎他跟他当时的女朋友在一起

translation.en: and so then, while I'm still in labor, he calls.
translation.zh:
‎然后 当我正在分娩的过程中
‎他打来电话说：

translation.en: "Is it okay if I just don't show up?" And I was like, "No!"
translation.zh:
‎“要是我不到场 应该也没关系吧？”
‎我吼到：“有关系！”

translation.en: So what he did was he actually came and he laid on the bed next to me
translation.zh:
‎于是他后来还是到场了
‎但他来了后 就躺在我旁边的床上

translation.en: and slept while I was having a baby.
translation.zh: ‎自己睡觉了 留我在旁边生孩子

translation.en: [Betsy] Luckily, you're in so much pain that you don't think about it too much,
translation.zh:
‎幸运的是 当你这么痛苦的时候
‎不会去想太多这种事

translation.en: but yeah, it was sad, but…
translation.zh: ‎是啊 不过确实挺伤人的 但…

translation.en: That whole thing about what doesn't kill you makes you stronger?
translation.zh:
‎那句话怎么说的？
‎那些杀不死你的 只会让你更强大？

translation.en: Well, guess what.
translation.zh: ‎你猜怎么着？

translation.en: There's not a whole lot of things that will happen to me worse than that.
translation.zh:
‎反正是不会有什么比这个还糟糕的事
‎发生在我身上了

translation.en: So…
translation.zh: ‎所以嘛…

translation.en: [Betsy] As soon as the baby was born, he was gone.
translation.zh: ‎宝宝一出生 他就离开了

translation.en: He was back on the road with his girlfriend.
translation.zh: ‎他回去继续跟他的女友潇洒了

translation.en: [Sumati] I remember I was shocked when "Brahmi" got pregnant.
translation.zh: ‎我记得婆罗米怀孕的时候 我很震惊

translation.en: [Sumati] He told me he wasn't even sleeping with her.
translation.zh: ‎他跟我说 他已经不跟她上床了

translation.en: [Betsy] He used to tell Sumati,
translation.zh: ‎他过去会跟苏马提说：

translation.en: "I can do some kind of voodoo magic on you and you'll never get pregnant."
translation.zh:
‎“我可以在你身上施展某种巫毒法术
‎让你永远也不会怀孕”

translation.en: She believed he could put a spell on her and she wouldn't get pregnant.
translation.zh:
‎她相信了他可以对她施法
‎让她怀不上孕

translation.en: But my daughter had just been born and she was already showing.
translation.zh:
‎但我的女儿才刚出生的时候
‎她已经大肚子了

translation.en: [Sumati] Right before the Lotus Temple opened,
translation.zh: ‎就在莲花寺开张之前

translation.en: I told Bhagavan that I was pregnant with Tilakam.
translation.zh: ‎我告诉博伽梵 我怀上了提拉卡姆

translation.en: First he said it wasn't his child… [sighs]
translation.zh: ‎一开始他说 那不是他的孩子

translation.en: …and then he said I needed to get an abortion,
translation.zh: ‎接着他说 我必须去堕胎

translation.en: and he tried to guilt trip me into one.
translation.zh: ‎他还试图利用我的内疚骗我做

translation.en: [Doc] Tilakam's mom was a crazy teenager
translation.zh: ‎提拉卡姆的妈妈是个疯癫的少女

translation.en: that, you know, I just happened to have been hanging out with a little too long,
translation.zh:
‎我只是很不巧地
‎跟她在一起的时间太久了一些

translation.en: and she got pregnant.
translation.zh: ‎结果她怀孕了

translation.en: I drug her ass
translation.zh:
‎我给她下了药
‎把她带去了华府市中心的万豪

translation.en: to the Downtown Marriott in Washington DC, and didn't follow through
translation.zh:
‎我给她下了药
‎把她带去了华府市中心的万豪 ‎办事的时候
‎没有采取该采取的避孕措施

translation.en: on the birth control the way we were supposed to do it
translation.zh:
‎办事的时候
‎没有采取该采取的避孕措施

translation.en: and, lo and behold, baby!
translation.zh: ‎谁能想到呢 宝宝！

translation.en: [Sumati] I called Swami Satchidananda and I finally confessed to him
translation.zh:
‎我给沙吉难陀打了个电话
‎终于向他坦白了一切

translation.en: I'd been in a relationship with Bhagavan for four years and I was pregnant.
translation.zh:
‎说我已经跟博伽梵在一起了四年
‎现在我怀孕了

translation.en: He basically said, "You're going to be a great mother."
translation.zh:
‎他的意思基本上就是：
‎“你肯定会是个很棒的母亲”

translation.en: He said, "If Bhagavan will marry you, he can stay in Yogaville."
translation.zh:
‎他说：“如果博伽梵愿意娶你的话
‎他就能留在瑜伽村”

translation.en: "If he continues with the women like he is now, he's gonna have to leave."
translation.zh:
‎“要是他继续像现在这样对待女人
‎那他就得离开”

translation.en: There was a family meeting that was called to deal with this
translation.zh:
‎他们举行了一场家庭会议
‎专门来应对这一个

translation.en: devastating news.
translation.zh: ‎令人心碎的消息

translation.en: And in the family meeting, they…
translation.zh: ‎而在这个家庭会议上 他们…

translation.en: were trying to blame the girls
translation.zh: ‎试图把责任推在女孩身上

translation.en: for their… wanton behavior.
translation.zh: ‎说这是因为她们… ‎水性杨花

translation.en: [Joan] My husband and I said, "Excuse me."
translation.zh: ‎我丈夫和我说：“不好意思”

translation.en: "This is a man who was promoted by our teacher as this great Yogi,
translation.zh:
‎“这个男人 明明被我们大师
‎赞誉为一个伟大的瑜伽士

translation.en: and you're saying the girls should not have trusted him?"
translation.zh: ‎你们的意思是女孩们不该信任他？”

translation.en: "That doesn't seem reasonable. It seems to me the bad guy is the adult."
translation.zh:
‎“这样一点也不合理 在我看来
‎这件事里的坏人应该是那个成年人”

translation.en: [Sachi] There was a culture of pointing the finger at women.
translation.zh: ‎那里存在着一种责怪女性的文化

translation.en: We were seducing men, that somehow it was our fault.
translation.zh:
‎是我们在引诱男人们
‎莫名其妙的 这成了我们的错

translation.en: All of a sudden, the community decided
translation.zh: ‎忽然之间 集体决定

translation.en: that every student, and parent, and teacher involved in the school
translation.zh:
‎与学校相关的
‎每一个学生、家长和老师

translation.en: should sign a pledge.
translation.zh: ‎应该书面签署一个誓约书

translation.en: Basically saying that they won't date.
translation.zh: ‎内容基本上就是 不能与彼此交往

translation.en: [Sachi] And also there's something about not questioning Swami Satchidananda.
translation.zh: ‎里面还提到 不许质疑沙吉难陀

translation.en: We felt like we were being punished.
translation.zh: ‎我们感觉到这是在惩罚我们

translation.en: We needed to just cover up, shut up.
translation.zh:
‎我们需要做的
‎就是把事情瞒过去 闭口不提

translation.en: Get permission to do… anything.
translation.zh: ‎做任何事 都需要得到许可

translation.en: People of the opposite sex would not be in the same room together alone.
translation.zh:
‎两个异性的人
‎不许独自待在同一个房间里

translation.en: And if a parent, a child, or a teacher was unwilling to sign the pledge,
translation.zh:
‎要是有家长、孩子或是老师
‎不愿意签这个誓约书

translation.en: they couldn't attend or teach at the school.
translation.zh: ‎那他们就不能来学校里教书或者上学

translation.en: I didn't want to sign it.
translation.zh: ‎我不想签这个东西

translation.en: When I spoke out, the community
translation.zh: ‎当我表达了这个想法后 集体…

translation.en: asked me to leave.
translation.zh: ‎要求我离开

translation.en: [Sachi] Swami Satchidananda told me directly.
translation.zh: ‎沙吉难陀直截了当地跟我说

translation.en: He was like, "You're a rotten apple."
translation.zh: ‎他说：“你是颗烂苹果”

translation.en: "You're going to make the other shiny, bright apples rotten, too."
translation.zh:
‎“你会害得其他闪闪发亮的苹果
‎也烂掉的”

translation.en: [Sachi] Being excommunicated and shunned was painful.
translation.zh: ‎被集体放逐和回避是很痛苦的

translation.en: My whole world was Yogaville. I didn't know anything else.
translation.zh: ‎瑜伽村是我的全世界 ‎除此之外我什么都不懂

translation.en: Yogaville failed our kids
translation.zh: ‎瑜伽村让我们的孩子们失望了

translation.en: by not taking a stand.
translation.zh: ‎没有站出来表态

translation.en: By the time I got pregnant,
translation.zh: ‎到了我怀上孕的那时候

translation.en: he was already in a relationship with another 14-year-old.
translation.zh:
‎他就已经跟另一个14岁少女
‎搞上了关系

translation.en: Once you've married a 14-year-old… [scoffs]
translation.zh: ‎一旦你跟一个14岁的人结了婚

translation.en: …what could possibly…
translation.zh: ‎那还能有什么事…

translation.en: hold you back?
translation.zh: ‎是你做不出来的？

translation.en: [Radha Hirsch] Never in a million years
translation.zh: ‎我从来没有想过

translation.en: did I ever think I would be sharing this story publicly. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎自己这辈子会公开分享这个故事

translation.en: When I hear myself, I'm like, "Wow, it is pretty crazy."
translation.zh:
‎当我听到自己讲出来后
‎我心想：“哇 这还真够疯狂的”

translation.en: I was 14 and he was 25.
translation.zh: ‎那时我14岁 他25岁

translation.en: My mom was wanting me to realize how inappropriate the situation was.
translation.zh:
‎我妈一直想让我认识到
‎这整件事有多么的不合伦理

translation.en: And I remember him saying,
translation.zh: ‎我记得他会说：

translation.en: "Don't worry, we're going to deal with it. It's all going to work out."
translation.zh:
‎“别担心 我们共同面对
‎一切问题最后都会解决的”

translation.en: "Don't worry. We're going to be together."
translation.zh: ‎“别担心 我们会在一起的”

translation.en: Bhagavan and I were talking on the phone
translation.zh: ‎博伽梵跟我聊电话的时候

translation.en: and he wanted me to give him very specifically my route to school.
translation.zh:
‎他想要我把上学的路线
‎非常具体地描述给他

translation.en: We went over it and over it, and he came and pulled up next to me
translation.zh:
‎我们复习了一遍又一遍
‎然后他过来的时候 把车停在我旁边

translation.en: in a disguise of some sort.
translation.zh: ‎好像乔装打扮了一番

translation.en: He looked bizarre, like all the hair up in a hat and like, crazy funky glasses.
translation.zh:
‎他看起来古怪极了
‎所有的头发都塞进了帽子里 ‎戴着一副非常奇怪的眼镜

translation.en: And I jump in the car, I dumped my book bags in a dumpster
translation.zh:
‎然后我就跳上了车
‎把书包丢进了一个垃圾箱里

translation.en: and we flew off.
translation.zh: ‎就这样飞快地开走了

translation.en: In my mind, I ran away, yes, but I still, kind of, wasn't thinking
translation.zh:
‎在我脑中 是我自己离家出走的 没错
‎但我当时根本没怎么多想

translation.en: that it was really an abduction.
translation.zh: ‎那其实更像是一场绑架 ‎（紧急失踪 阿斯特洛夫 拉妲）
